Reviews.Title: This is a great camera package
Reviews.Author: Dave Newman
Reviews.Content: Way better camera than I am used to, but I'm learning.  Olds camera was SLR film and this by far out performs.

Reviews.Title: INCREDIBLE DEAL!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jack Kraft
Reviews.Content: Everything arrived quickly and was as advertised.This is a Christmas gift for my wife and she is beside herself happy with what we got for what we paid.Thank You!

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Lady aranzazu
Reviews.Content: its a pretty good camera, and its pretty complete! just need a better tripod and a gripp of batteries. thanks

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase.
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Great lens and extras.  I really can't say more about this purchase, it was well worth the money.  I recommend researching any lens before purchasing.

Reviews.Title: Great product, Great Price
Reviews.Author: David Henry
Reviews.Content: I wanted the Nikon D7100 after doing a spec comparison online. I looked around both online (and locally) and simply couldn't find a better deal than this. Shipping took a little while due to the blizzard back east, but I'm glad I waited. The camera was in excellent condition with no sleepy pixles. The remote control shutter wasn't working so I called Cameta and they said they'd send me a replacement immediately. That aside, all the items were in great order. This is a great package at an AMAZING price - I couldn't find better elsewhere. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D7100
Reviews.Author: Tom Neidermann
Reviews.Content: Great camera so far, nice pricing for the package.  Would have liked a different lens, but the 55 -200mm is fine for the pricing that the package sold for.

Reviews.Title: NIkon D7100
Reviews.Author: Nell
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera. Takes great photos. Very clear.Every lens is perfect. Just need to buy more lenses because it is only one here.
